url.title: Post URL
url.description: Direct URL to the Instagram post

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the post was created

hashtags.title: Hashtags
hashtags.description: Array of hashtags extracted from the caption

mentions.title: Mentions
mentions.description: Array of user mentions extracted from the caption

likesCount.title: Likes Count
likesCount.description: Number of likes on the post

commentsCount.title: Comments Count
commentsCount.description: Number of comments on the post

videoViewCount.title: Video View Count
videoViewCount.description: Number of video views (null for non-video posts)

displayUrl.title: Display URL
displayUrl.description: URL of the main display image

images.title: Images
images.description: Array of image URLs for sidecar posts

videoUrl.title: Video URL
videoUrl.description: URL of the video file (null for non-video posts)

videoDuration.title: Video Duration
videoDuration.description: Duration of the video in seconds (null for non-video posts)

isSponsored.title: Is Sponsored
isSponsored.description: Whether the post is sponsored content

paidPartnership.title: Paid Partnership
paidPartnership.description: Whether the post is a paid partnership

locationName.title: Location Name
locationName.description: Name of the location tagged in the post

ownerFullName.title: Owner Full Name
ownerFullName.description: Full name of the post owner

inputUrl.title: Input URL
inputUrl.description: Original profile URL that was scraped
